channel.title: CVE Feed for F5 Networks -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 Networks -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-5024|2024-08-06T00:46:40.252Z -- f5%20networks -- f5%20big-ip%20ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20gtm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem
item.description: Virtual servers in F5 BIG-IP systems 11.6.1 before 11.6.1 HF1 and 12.1.x before 12.1.2, when configured to parse RADIUS messages via an iRule, allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Traffic Management Microkernel restart) via crafted network traffic.

item.title: CVE-2016-6249|2024-08-06T01:22:20.654Z -- f5%20networks -- f5%20big-ip%2C%20rest%20framework%20logging
item.description: F5 BIG-IP 12.0.0 and 11.5.0 - 11.6.1 REST requests which timeout during user account authentication may log sensitive attributes such as passwords in plaintext to /var/log/restjavad.0.log. It may allow local users to obtain sensitive information by reading these files.
